title: Tomáš Bernady
text:
Tomáš Bernady (born 24 October 1969) is a <a href="Czech%20Republic">Czech</a> former <a href="association%20football">football</a> <a href="Goalkeeper%20%28association%20football%29">goalkeeper</a> who currently works as a football manager. He took over as manager of <a href="FC%20Ban%C3%ADk%20Ostrava">Banik Ostrava</a> in October 2013.
He represented <a href="Czechoslovakia">Czechoslovakia</a> in the <a href="1989%20FIFA%20World%20Youth%20Championship">1989 FIFA World Youth Championship</a>. He won 
<a href="1998%E2%80%9399%20Slovak%20Superliga">Slovak league title in 1999</a> with <a href="%C5%A0K%20Slovan%20Bratislava">Slovan Bratislava</a>, <a href="Czechoslovak%20Cup">Czechoslovak Cup</a> in 1991 with <a href="Ban%C3%ADk%20Ostrava">Baník Ostrava</a> and <a href="Slovak%20Cup">Slovak Cup</a> in 2003 with <a href="Matador%20P%C3%BAchov">Matador Púchov</a>.
